greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the sum of the reciprocals of the star numbers (A003154).
formula: Equals Sum_{n>=1} 1/(6*n*(n-1) + 1) = x * tan(x) with x = Pi/(2*sqrt(3)).
results.author: _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 18 2019
